scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.rebuild:docker:dev: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=dev docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up
scripts.rebuild:docker:prod: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=prod docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up
